::Halucigen::
Halucigen nodded to Cygnar.
"I am ready...I wish to rip apart some bots soon....thier body's and
minds."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Thomas <Kinger1984@y...> wrote:
>  Guiledart smiled. "Yes we are going to the other
> destron base first then we attack. I will have to stay
> behind...to make sure our own plan doesnt work against
> us. You however will go." He entered the bridge and
> nodded to Cygar. "You remember our old friend
> Halucinagen. He will be going with you to battle. Also
> I will stay behind and protect the base. Have you
> gotten hold of Drill bit?"
> --- gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > ::Halucigen::
> > Halucigen smiled and followed Guiledart. He was now
> > more ruthless then
> > ever and couldn't wait to get into battle.
> > "So are we attacking anyone soon."
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Thomas <Kinger1984@y...>
> > wrote:
> > >  Guiledart smiled. "Alright lets go to the
> > bridge." He
> > > started to walk away.
> > > --- gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > > ::Halucigen::
> > > > "Yes Guiledart.....it WAS a rough trip....."
> > > > Halucigen spoke standing
> > > > and walking out the door to Guiledart.
> > > >
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Thomas
> > <Kinger1984@y...>
> > > > wrote:
> > > > >  The light scrambled the bots circuts and put
> > it
> > > > out.
> > > > > After the chip was implanted a few percasions
> > were
> > > > put
> > > > > in inside its nueral net but could only be
> > > > activated
> > > > > through a lot of time and effort. He erased
> > his
> > > > memory
> > > > > and replaced it with false ones putting it
> > into
> > > > his
> > > > > spark so to make them seem perfectly real and
> > > > > ememenateing the chance of recessive dreams or
> > > > > flashbacks of his past life. He added in a few
> > new
> > > > > programs like loyalty to the destrons and the
> > main
> > > > > objective of destroying the earth and was
> > > > finished.
> > > > > His name was still halucinegen and had the
> > same
> > > > > characteristics just diffrent memories.
> > Destron
> > > > > memories. Of war and conquest as if he were
> > there
> > > > for
> > > > > every battle through thier galaxy trips. He
> > opened
> > > > the
> > > > > door to the chamber and motioned for the now
> > > > awakening
> > > > > bot to step out. "Come on Halucinegen you got
> > a
> > > > little
> > > > > banged up on our trip back to earth but your
> > fine
> > > > > now."
> > > > > --- gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > > > > ::Halucigen::
> > > > > > Halucigen fought it at first then realized
> > that
> > > > it
> > > > > > was pointless.
> > > > > > "Very well" he said letting the plant be
> > > > implanted
> > > > > > without any opposition.
> > > > > > "Just keep my skill programs
> > intact....Please!."
> > > > > >
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Thomas
> > > > <Kinger1984@y...>
> > > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > >  A trap door opened underneath the bot.
> > about
> > > > 20
> > > > > > wires
> > > > > > > came out wrapping around his legs. Pulling
> > him
> > > > > > down.
> > > > > > > As he fell through the tunnels Guiledart
> > > > spoke.
> > > > > > "Im
> > > > > > > sure you can understand I would like some
> > > > > > insurance."
> > > > > > > He popped into the chamber the door
> > underneath
> > > > > > > shutting. The light comeing out scrambling
> > his
> > > > > > circuts
> > > > > > > and must put him unconsious. "Now we can
> > > > reprogram
> > > > > > you
> > > > > > > as Destron." A arm came out with a destron
> > > > chip
> > > > > > and
> > > > > > > began to inplant it into the bots brain.
> > > > > > > --- gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > > > > > > > ::Halucigen::
> > > > > > > > "Greetings...My name is Halucigen. I was
> > > > talking
> > > > > > to
> > > > > > > > Magmatron before
> > > > > > > > his departure and I have come looking to
> > > > join
> > > > > > you. I
> > > > > > > > like the way your
> > > > > > > > work. TRapping and threatning.  And
> > don't
> > > > > > worry...if
> > > > > > > > i really wanted
> > > > > > > > out my Corrosion Missiles would take
> > care of
> > > > > > that. I
> > > > > > > > would like to
> > > > > > > > speak with you in person." Halucigen
> > replied
> > > > > > calmly
> > > > > > > > his small 5 foot
> > > > > > > > frame standing very cofidently.
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Thomas
> > > > > > <Kinger1984@y...>
> > > > > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > > >  Guiledart saw ahucenigen on the
> > monitor.
> > > > "Oh
> > > > > > good
> > > > > > > > a
> > > > > > > > > lab rat." A wall came up around the
> > bot
> > > > > > closeing
> > > > > > > > him
> > > > > > > > > into a 5 by 5 box. a screen appeared
> > with
> > > > > > > > guiledart on
> > > > > > > > > it. "Well hello my friend. Dont bother
> > > > trying
> > > > > > to
> > > > > > > > blast
> > > > > > > > > your way out of there it will be
> > futile.
> > > > One
> > > > > > > > question.
> > > > > > > > > Why are you here?"
